title: Day 642
content:
# Day 642

The best products are those which don't need to be sold. Why? Because everyone wants them. Selling ice cream on a hot day is considerably easier than in the depths of winter. Products that everyone wants require little effort to sell.

Such products include

- money

- sex

- drugs

- rock and roll

- plenty of other things

Many items on this list are vices. However, not all high-demand products are vices, nor do they need to be. Depends on context everyone has their own demons to battle.

I appreciate those who use their time to master a skill. To perfect a craft.

Becoming obsessed with something is easy. Staying obsessed with that thing is hard. Find what brings you purpose so you can stay passionate. Life is better with passion.

![](https://miro.medium.com/0*paJKJwEEDz0CVlpv)

Also, Merry Christmas Eve. Stay Frosty❄️

12/24/23

Conor Jay Chepenik
